name: Mains, Sub Mains Cable in Conduits or on Trays ITP004
template name: Mains, Sub Mains Cable in Conduits or on Trays ITP004

name: Measure cable runs with appropriate accurate measuring instrument (eg tape measure, wheel)
Check cable sizes resistance of protective earth conductor - shall be low enough to permit passage of current necessary to operate protective device
Confirm length of cable if sub contract item & order

Install cable in appliance method (EG. Cable stands, electric winch, pulleys etc.) - ANY CABLE NOT TERMINATED IMMEDIATELY MUST HAVE
THE ENDS TAPED COVERING THE BARE COPPER - please take a photo
Trefoil cables & tie cables to support system (ensure spacing)
Check requirements for cable identification & install
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
